# research questions

* What kind of homophilic force brings microbloggers together in the social media
- geographic versus similarlity in user profile
- User discovery?

# method

* Data from Jan-1 2015 to Feb-28 from weiboscope
* Only study the retweet behavior
* Nodes are microbloggers
* Edges are retweets between microbloggers at least 3 times.
* community detection algo is walk.trap
* Only retain those belong to large communities (defined as community with at least 100 members)
